class pyxalign.options.GPUOptions(chunking_enabled: bool = True, chunk_length: int = 20, n_gpus: int = 1, gpu_indices: tuple[int] = (0,))[source]

Bases: object

chunk_length: int = 20
chunking_enabled: bool = True
gpu_indices: tuple[int] = (0,)

The GPU indices to use for computation. If empty, use whatever GPUs are available in order.

n_gpus: int = 1

class pyxalign.options.GradientIntegrationUnwrapOptions(gradient_method: pyxalign.api.enums.ImageGradientMethods = <ImageGradientMethods.FOURIER_DIFFERENTIATION: 'fourier_differentiation'>, integration_method: pyxalign.api.enums.ImageIntegrationMethods = <ImageIntegrationMethods.FOURIER: 'fourier'>, fourier_shift_step: float = 0.5, use_masks: bool = True, deramp_polyfit_order: int = 1)[source]

Bases: object

deramp_polyfit_order: int = 1

The order of the polynomial fit used to de-ramp the phase

fourier_shift_step: float = 0.5

The finite-difference step size used to calculate the gradient, if the Fourier shift method is selected

gradient_method: ImageGradientMethods = 'fourier_differentiation'

The method used to calculate the phase gradient

integration_method: ImageIntegrationMethods = 'fourier'

The method used to integrate the image back from gradients

use_masks: bool = True

Determines if the projection masks should be multiplied with the projections before unwrapping

class pyxalign.options.IterativeResidualUnwrapOptions(iterations: int = 10, lsq_fit_ramp_removal: bool = False)[source]

Bases: object

iterations: int = 10

Number of iterative correction steps to perform

lsq_fit_ramp_removal: bool = False

Whether to remove phase ramps using least-squares fitting after unwrapping

class pyxalign.options.PhaseUnwrapOptions(device: pyxalign.api.options.device.DeviceOptions = <factory>, method: pyxalign.api.enums.PhaseUnwrapMethods = <PhaseUnwrapMethods.ITERATIVE_RESIDUAL_CORRECTION: 'iterative_residual_correction'>, gradient_integration: pyxalign.api.options.options.GradientIntegrationUnwrapOptions = <factory>, iterative_residual: pyxalign.api.options.options.IterativeResidualUnwrapOptions = <factory>)[source]

Bases: object

device: DeviceOptions
gradient_integration: GradientIntegrationUnwrapOptions

Options for GradientIntegration unwrapping

iterative_residual: IterativeResidualUnwrapOptions

Options for IterativeResidualCorrection unwrapping

method: PhaseUnwrapMethods = 'iterative_residual_correction'

Phase unwrapping method to use

Options: - PhaseUnwrapMethods.IterativeResidualCorrection

  • default choice; typically performs better

  • PhaseUnwrapMethods.GradientIntegration

    • can perform better if the IterativeResidualCorrection

    unwrapping is producing large phase ramps - same unwrapping method that is used by pty-chi
